Room.Name: Leviathan Drive/Hofton Avenue Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Hofton Avenue and Leviathan Drive.
Room.LongDescription: Leviathan Drive heads off to the south out of the intersection with Hofton Avenue, which runs east and west. Running parallel to Hofton Avenue is the north City Wall, protecting the city from invasions, attacks and assaults from various factions from the wastelands outside the city.
